html: Proud to support the Health Care Affordability Act, which will: Cut monthly premiums by more than $1k for average NY family making $110,000 Offer low-cost insurance to 22,000 uninsured people in #NY11 Cap premiums for individual market consumers at 8.5% of income
text:
Proud to support the Health Care Affordability Act, which will:

Cut monthly premiums by more than $1k for average NY family making $110,000

Offer low-cost insurance to 22,000 uninsured people in #NY11
Cap premiums for individual market consumers at 8.5% of income

html: The science is clear: #VaccinesWork. They helped eradicate Measles from the U.S. in 2000, but now we've seen nearly 300 new cases right here in NY. That's why this #WorldImmunizationWeek, we must recommit to ensuring that children everywhere have access to lifesaving vaccines.
text:
The science is clear: #VaccinesWork. They helped eradicate Measles from the U.S. in 2000, but now we've seen nearly 300 new cases right here in NY.

That's why this #WorldImmunizationWeek, we must recommit to ensuring that children everywhere have access to lifesaving vaccines.

html: Background checks save lives, plain & simple. In the states that have already passed background check laws: 53% fewer police officers are shot & killed in the line of duty. 57% fewer women are shot to death by abusive partners. It’s time to say #NeverAgain and pass #HR8.
text:
Background checks save lives, plain & simple. In the states that have already passed background check laws:

53% fewer police officers are shot & killed in the line of duty. 
57% fewer women are shot to death by abusive partners. 

It’s time to say #NeverAgain and pass #HR8.
